author: dcspark
title: Milkomeda documentation(JP, KR, ZH)
description: Documentation for Milkomeda is currently only in English. We want to translate these documents to other languages to grow Cardano
solution: Translate onboarding documents for users & developers to other languages
experience: Our team is composed of well known ex-Emurgo and ex-IOHK employees who have been building the Cardano ecosystem for the past several years
